resources.string: "DigiLocker 'Issued Documents' are at par with origonal Documents as per IT ACT 2020"
"Documents from digiLocker are valid in airports across India under the AAI notification."
"Indian Railways now accept digital aadhaar and Driving License as from DigiLocker as valid ID proof."
"Class X and XII Marks Sheets and Passing Certificates of Maharashtra State Board of Secondary and Higher Secondary and Higher Secondary Education are available in DigiLocker."
